growthexperiments-confirmemail-emailhelp: Por rekuperar vua pasovorto se vu perdos ol, bezonesos vua e-postal adreso.
growthexperiments-signupcampaign-title: Danko pro vua donaco! Nun, enirez la komunitato di redakteri, e plubonigez Wikipedio hodie
growthexperiments-signupcampaign-body: Editing Wikipedia can be as simple as adding a link or changing a word. Get suggestions for articles in {{GENDER:|your}} topics of interest after you create your account!
growthexperiments-signupcampaign-bullet1: Sugesti pri artikli qui {{GENDER:|vu}} povas prizar
growthexperiments-signupcampaign-bullet2: Pregez helpo de plu experta redaktero
growthexperiments-signupcampaign-bullet3: Komencez kun redakturi kurta e facila
